name: Yo desarrollo, tu juegas
description:
Hey, i have tried to make a roguelite about spanish tense verbs, sounds boring right?

In this game you will face different famous spanish writters while you try to learn how to write the different tenses, in your path of learning you will get upgrades for make everything more easy but the challenge also goes up over the time.

Yes, maybe it's not the most enjoyfull roguelite, but i think that is one of the best ways to learn the spanish tense verbs, and that was my objective.

My lapse of time has been since 4 of March at 11:00 to 11 of March at 11:00.

(I have uploaded it a little more late because i am trying to download the tools in unity to play in the browser..., but i have already ended the game, i promise :v)
